Question
========

Of an artists' society, 50% of the members are women and 50% of the members male. Of the women, 40% are alcoholics and 80% of the men. A member is randomly elected a member from the membership. This one turns out to be alcoholic. What is the probability that it is a woman?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.20
* 0.33
* 0.56

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.20: Incorrect
* 0.33: Correct
* 0.56: Incorrect
